title.narrative: Humanitarian & Stabilisation Operations Team (HSOT) Surge Deployments

description.narrative: This activity (Humanitarian & Stabilisation Operations Team (HSOT) Surge Deployments) is a component of Ebola Virus Disease Outbreaks #10, #11 and #12 in the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) - UK Response reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £2,257,449. This component benefits Africa, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Infectious disease control. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-05-2019 and the end date is 31-03-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
